    • onDisconnect

      public void onDisconnect​(Client client)
      Description copied from class: ServerInstance
      Event fired when client has disconnected, sockets haven't been closed but are inaccessible. After this method, the client is removed from ServerInstance.clients
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
